snippet: The accounts from Madrid are of the 20th inst. The Progresista party appear to be more divided than ever. M. Madoz had addressed a manifesto to his constituents which had given great displeasure to a certain fraction of that party....
lead_paragraph: The accounts from Madrid are of the 20th inst. The Progresista party appear to be more divided than ever. M. Madoz had addressed a manifesto to his constituents which had given great displeasure to a certain fraction of that party.
